channel.title: events on Threads Of Life
channel.description: Recent content in events on Threads Of Life

item.title: A musical evening!
item.description: Last evening couldn't have been much better. It's not quite often that one witnesses ordinary people with extra-ordinary talent. World No Tobacco Day (WNTD) is observed around the world every year on May 31st. In order to spread the awareness of cancer, NGO Helping Hand had organized a special musical evening in Mumbai. The event saw eminent personalities including Mrs. Priya Dutt, Mrs. Manisha Koirala and Mr. Johny Joseph felicitating cancer survivors.

item.title: An event to remember!
item.description: On a lazy Sunday morning most of us would just wake up, have a cup of coffee and read the newspaper to see what's new. How many of you would be ready to face a quiz? A quiz that would test your skills in engineering across all it's disciplines. An inter-corporate event was held and involved participants from all across India competing in a battle of wits. It's hard to believe, right?
